IncidentDef.label: Defend an outpost of an ally faction from a raid
IncidentDef.letterText:
{0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

A vital Outpost is coming under attack and the they are requesting that you send reinforcements to defend it, which means eliminating all enemies attacking the outpost.

If we succeed, their relations will improve, and they'll send us this reward worth {5}:

{3}

If we don't arrive to reinforce the outpost in {4} days, the outpost will be captured and will be used as a forward operating camp to launch a stronger than usual raid on you. {2} will also weaken.

IncidentDef.label: Attack an enemy settlement with an ally
IncidentDef.letterText:
{0}, {1} of {2}, has sent us a message.

Apparently they found a weakness in a nearby enemy settlement's defenses. They've asked us to help them in their planned raid, which means eliminating all enemies and turrets together with their raid party.

If we succeed, their relations will improve, and they'll send us this reward worth {5}:

{3}

If at least one fighters from the raid party survives they will add a bonus reward of ${6} in silver

If we don't destroy the settlement in {4} days, the settlement's weakness will be reinforce and the opportunity will pass.
